hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira: Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "If any one of you improves (follows strictly) his Islamic religion then his good deeds will be rewarded ten times to seven hundred times for each good deed and a bad deed will be recorded as it is

chapter.eng-name: (What is said regarding the superiority of) a person who embraces Islam sincerely.
